700866f-b.title: Bronx: Dewey Avenue - Throggs Neck Boulevard
700866f-b.text:
(1)
Dewey Ave., at Throgas Neck Boulevard (vantage point). The
view is eastward across Weir Creek and shows the Edgewater Park
bungalow colony on the shore of Long lIsland Sound.
July 1, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
A closer view of the same showing the Creek (right) and Sound
more prominently.
July 1, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
700866f-b.folder: Dewey Avenue & Throggs Neck Boulevard, Bronx, NY
